verses.verse: Therefore, <WG3606> holy <WG40> brethren, <WG80> partakers <WG3353> of a heavenly <WG2032> calling, <WG2821> consider <WG2657> Jesus, <WG2424> the Apostle <WG652> and High <WG749> Priest <WG749> of our confession. <WG3671>
He was faithful <WG4103> to Him who appointed <WG4160> Him, as Moses <WG3475> also <WG2532> was in all <WG3650> His house. <WG3624>

For He has been counted <WG515> worthy <WG515> of more <WG4183> glory <WG1391> than <WG3844> Moses, <WG3475> by just <WG2596> so <WG3745> much <WG3745> as the builder <WG2680> of the house <WG3624> has <WG2192> more <WG4183> honor <WG5092> than the house. <WG3624>
For every <WG3956> house <WG3624> is built <WG2680> by someone, <WG5100> but the builder <WG2680> of all <WG3956> things <WG3956> is God. <WG2316>
Now <WG2532> Moses <WG3475> was faithful <WG4103> in all <WG3650> His house <WG3624> as a servant, <WG2324> for a testimony <WG3142> of those <WG3588> things which were to be spoken <WG2980> later;

but Christ <WG5547> [was faithful] as a Son <WG5207> over <WG1909> His house <WG3624> whose <WG3739> house <WG3624> we are, if <WG1437> we hold <WG2722> fast <WG2722> our confidence <WG3954> and the boast <WG2745> of our hope <WG1680> firm <WG949> until <WG3360> the end. <WG5056>
Therefore, <WG1352> just <WG2531> as the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> says, <WG3004> "Today <WG4594> if <WG1437> you hear <WG191> His voice, <WG5456>
Do not harden <WG4645> your hearts <WG2588> as when <WG1722> they provoked <WG3894> Me, As in the day <WG2250> of trial <WG3986> in the wilderness, <WG2048>
Where <WG3757> your fathers <WG3962> tried <WG3985> [Me] by testing <WG7047> [Me], And saw <WG3708> My works <WG2041> for forty <WG5065> years. <WG2094>

"Therefore <WG1352> I was angry <WG4360> with this <WG3778> generation, <WG1074> And said, <WG3004> 'They always <WG104> go <WG4105> astray <WG4105> in their heart; <WG2588> And they did not know <WG1097> My ways <WG3598>';
As I swore <WG3660> in My wrath, <WG3709> 'They shall not enter <WG1525> My rest. <WG2663>'"

Take <WG991> care, <WG991> brethren, <WG80> lest <WG3379> there should be in any <WG5100> one <WG5100> of you an evil, <WG4190> unbelieving <WG570> heart, <WG2588> in falling <WG868> away <WG868> from the living <WG2198> God. <WG2316>

But encourage <WG3870> one <WG1438> another <WG1438> day <WG2250> after <WG2596> day, <WG2250> as long <WG891> as it is [still] called <WG2564> "Today, <WG4594>" lest <WG2443> <WG3361> any <WG5100> one <WG5100> of you be hardened <WG4645> by the deceitfulness <WG539> of sin. <WG266>

For we have become <WG1096> partakers <WG3353> of Christ, <WG5547> if <WG1437> <WG4007> we hold <WG2722> fast <WG2722> the beginning <WG746> of our assurance <WG5287> firm <WG949> until <WG3360> the end; <WG5056>
while <WG1722> it is said, <WG3004> "Today <WG4594> if <WG1437> you hear <WG191> His voice, <WG5456> Do not harden <WG4645> your hearts, <WG2588> as when <WG1722> they provoked <WG3894> Me."
For who <WG5101> provoked <WG3893> [Him] when they had heard <WG191>? Indeed, <WG235> did not all <WG3956> those <WG3588> who <WG5101> came <WG1831> out of Egypt <WG125> [led] by Moses <WG3475>?

And with whom <WG5101> was He angry <WG4360> for forty <WG5065> years <WG2094>? Was it not with those <WG3588> who <WG5101> sinned, <WG264> whose <WG3739> bodies <WG2966> fell <WG4098> in the wilderness <WG2048>?
And to whom <WG5101> did He swear <WG3660> that they should not enter <WG1525> His rest, <WG2663> but to those <WG3588> who <WG5101> were disobedient <WG544>?
And [so] we see <WG991> that they were not able <WG1410> to enter <WG1525> because <WG1223> of unbelief. <WG570>
